item.description: This group is for anyone who wants to explore their spiritual path and receive and provide support in a sacred group setting.  We will share what challenges us, what keeps us going. Expect to receive clarity, support and connection.  Evening includes light facilitation, meditation, guided visualization as well as individual readings with angel/oracle cards. This is a free evening.  A longer series will be offered in the near future.
item.how_to_find_us: Enter at door next to H&R Block, go up one flight to 6B
item.why: This is a sharing and healing circle to receive and provide support in a sacred group setting. This free evening replaces the 3-part series formerly annouced to begin Thurs. May 26.
item.name: Soul Healing Gathering- free evening
